function.signature: JMVC.head.lastModified(String src, Boolean parse, Boolean explicit)
function.description: Add a stylesheet in the head section

params.param: this can be the url of the stylesheet or the stylesheet content (you can even use \{\{mystyle color=`#ff33cc` ... \}\} )
set true if You mean to use JMVC.vars variables placeholders in the stylesheet
set true if You mean to pass the stylesheet content or a view placeholder in the src (even with on-the-fly variables), in that case 'parse' argument will be considered as true in any case
